product_name: Lonely Planet Guides Yellowstone and Grand Teton National Parks - 3rd Edition
long_description: Take the guesswork out of exploring these iconic parks with the help of Lonely Planet Guides. Authors: Bradley Mayhew and Carolyn McCarthy. Softcover; 296 pages; short section of full-color photographs and 2-tone maps. Lonely Planet Publications Ltd.; copyright 2012. Lonely Planet Guides. Explore the parks with great itineraries from 1 day to 1 week, and check out the section on the 20 best experiences you won't want to miss. Bison, elk, bears, moose, wolves, bald eagles-this guide tells you where to spot them. Includes the best spots for hiking, camping, rock climbing, skiing, fishing, boating and more. Offers hundreds of places to stay, eat and play, as well as how to find a wealth of hidden treasures. Measures 7.75 x 5 in.
short_description: Take the guesswork out of exploring these iconic parks with the help of Lonely Planet Guides Yellowstone and Grand Teton National Parks .
